title: Power cuts extended by an hour for several areas today
body_lines: The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) says it has approved an additional hour of power cuts for parts of the country today, at the request of the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB), due to the high energy demand during the weekend.

The PUCSL said due to the unexpected high energy demand during the weekend, it has decided to impose power cuts for one more hour between 9.00am to 3.00pm today (March 27) in the areas under the Groups P, Q, R, S, T, U, V and W.
